comments.body: I couldn't quite tell from your PR. Is the convenience home: argument on MaterialApp etc going away and everything's going to be specified via Page or wtv we're going to end up calling it or is there still one exception dead-simple API for providing a home widget (to associate a default title with)?
all the major stuff (including home) will be backwards compatible, though i am intending there to be an alternative to them that doesn't require that you use them even in the simple case.
